scripts.proxy-server: SET PORT=3000&& SET DEBUG=proxy-server:* && SET BASE_URL=http://localhost:3002&& node src/server/proxy-server
scripts.proxy-executor: SET DEBUG=proxy-executor:*&& SET PROXY_HOST=http://localhost:3000&& node src/executor/proxy-executor
scripts.proxy-client: SET PORT=3001&& SET DEBUG=proxy-client:*&& SET PROXY_HOST=http://localhost:3000&& SET NEW_HOST=http://localhost:3002&& node src/client/proxy-client
scripts.dummy-api: SET PORT=3002&& SET DEBUG=dummy-api&& node src/dummy-api/dummy-api
